Name: This Is Space
About the game: This is Space is humorous 2D multiplayer rag doll game where you play as astronauts to fight off waves of aliens trying to invade your ship by pushing, shoving and forcing their head into the walls and furniture in the ship or you fight against another player in the versus mode. Survival Mode Try to survive against the aliens and take down as many as possible while playing solo or with a friend. Versus Mode Fight another player in the spaceship. Controls: P1: Move with WASD, grab with Space, push with V P2: Move with Arrow Keys, grab with Ctrl, push with Shift To be added - More maps - More modes to play other than survival and versus mode - More weapons - More alien types - Customization - Controller support - Updated graphics Yeah and that's it, this is space.
